members.member:
This will validate postcode
validation status POST: api/ValidateAuthenticatedPostcode Body: { "APIKey":"xyz","APISecret":"abc","PostcodeNumber":"408600" }

This will check NRIC Validation.
NRIC validtion result POST: api/NRICValidation/S1234567D

This will check NRIC Validation: IDType - S=Singaporean;F=Forigner
validtion result POST: api/NRICValidation/S1234567D

validation status POST: api/ValidateAuthenticatedPostcode Body: { "APIKey":"xyz","APISecret":"abc","PostcodeNumber":"408600" }
